name: Resident Evil 0 Demake
overview: A demake demo of Resident Evil 0 was created by modders Biohazard España and El Rincón del Lobezno, using the original Resident Evil 2 as its base. The game started life on the Nintendo 64 before development was canceled and moved to the GameCube. This PlayStation homebrew, therefore, attempts to recreate what the game may have looked at its earliest point.
